LanguageData.CM_Tradeable_Trinkets_Thing_Trinket_Doll: A small doll made with love.
LanguageData.CM_Tradeable_Trinkets_Thing_Trinket_Indu: A portable gaming device that fits in ones pocket. Play horseshoes anywhere in four vivid colors!
LanguageData.CM_Tradeable_Trinkets_Thing_Trinket_Spac: A slick, must-have electronic gadget. This device will truly revolutionize your life. Records personal information about the user in order to provide a customized experience.
LanguageData.CM_Tradeable_Trinkets_Thing_Trinket_Trib: A small totem depicting animals and characters from tribal stories.
